modName: More Hotkey Please And SKSE 1-7 Script Patch
summary: More Hot Keys Please has a script that checks the SKSE version in a way that prevents it from working correctly with the latest SKSE 1.7.0 Alpha version.  This mod has just the one script, modified to work with all versions of SKSE 1.6+.  It removes the check for the beta version.
descriptionHtml:
MORE HOT KEYS PLEASE + SKSE 1.7.0 PATCH

This mod has the one MHP script that prevented MHP from working correctly with SKSE 1.7.0. I do not know Papyrus. I found the solution on the MHP page, changed the script, and used the Construction Kit to compile the modified script.

For all I know, the SKSE check only stopped me from setting a hotkey that allows me to setup a basic hotkey. I only use MHP in for various basic hotkeys that either equip or auto-cast a spell. So, my usage is very basic.

Let me know if you have any other problems.

INSTALLATION:

Install MHP and SKSE first! This zip file has a single script file (and its source file) that will over-write the following files from MHP in your Skyrim/data folder:

Scripts/MHP_Write.pex
Scripts/Source/MHP_Write.psc

There is no esp to activate!

UNINSTALL:

To untinstall this mod and return to the script provided by MHP, you will need to uninstall this mod and reinstall MHP.

DO IT YOURSELF WITH THE CK

If you want to just make the change yourself and recompile the script, you will first need to install the SkyUI SDK 4.1 files from here: [url=https://github.com/schlangster/skyui/wiki]SkyUI Wiki[/url]

And, of course you need to have SKSE installed correctly.

CREDITS

UlithiumDragon - for supplying the script solution!

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23416/?]More Hotkeys Please[/url]
[url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url]
author: GamerRick
